channel.title: Comments on: The Mayor of Monkey town
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Vanessa
item.description: Will, reading your blog is like reading a Bill Bryson travelogue. Now I want to eat sheep eyeball and jump around with 70 Chinese 5 year olds barking like a dog. You're the best and I can't wait until you get back to the states and I can hear your stories in person!
item.content:encoded: Will, reading your blog is like reading a Bill Bryson travelogue. Now I want to eat sheep eyeball and jump around with 70 Chinese 5 year olds barking like a dog. You’re the best and I can’t wait until you get back to the states and I can hear your stories in person!

item.title: by: elenore
item.description: the monkey temple sounds unreal and totally amazing. for some reason while i was reading this i kept thinking of the movie you made with monty where you switch his brain and the gorillas brain... I bet you have gotten lots of new movie ideas from your travels
item.content:encoded: the monkey temple sounds unreal and totally amazing. for some reason while i was reading this i kept thinking of the movie you made with monty where you switch his brain and the gorillas brain… I bet you have gotten lots of new movie ideas from your travels

item.title: by: Jane
item.description:
How are you recently?
Tomorrow is..

item.title: by: Pukie
item.description: Wow,wow,wow!!! it's so so so nice to know it.
item.content:encoded: Wow,wow,wow!!! it’s so so so nice to know it.

item.title: by: Michelle Allerdice
item.description:
Well I talk about it, talk about it, talk about it, talk about movin.
Won't you take me to, MonKEY Toowwwnn? Won't you take me to, Monkey towwwnn.
item.content:encoded:
Well I talk about it, talk about it, talk about it, talk about movin.

Won’t you take me to, MonKEY Toowwwnn? Won’t you take me to, Monkey towwwnn.

item.title: by: Carson
item.description:
Man, that is so cool. You're my hero, Will-in-a-China-shop.
You're like the Man with No Name in a monkey-version of Fistful of Dollars. Or Yojimbo. Whichever.
Also, as for Doug Brown, of course he would know about monkeytown. Through his continued efforts to pass monkey voting rights, he would have researched the long-term effects of such legislation. Duh.
item.content:encoded:
Man, that is so cool. You’re my hero, Will-in-a-China-shop.

You’re like the Man with No Name in a monkey-version of Fistful of Dollars. Or Yojimbo. Whichever.

Also, as for Doug Brown, of course he would know about monkeytown. Through his continued efforts to pass monkey voting rights, he would have researched the long-term effects of such legislation. Duh.

item.title: by: marcus
item.description:
WOW
I have been smiling all day thinking about monkey town, the sharks and the jets, stark blacks in whites, only the people are gray in Monkey Town. I am so glad that there is a place like this on planet earth. You move through the world so freely and honestly (bribes aside).
You must have fit in well with the Thai people, takes one to know one kind of nice guy kind of thing. "super nice and all huge smiles"
item.content:encoded:
WOW

I have been smiling all day thinking about monkey town, the sharks and the jets, stark blacks in whites, only the people are gray in Monkey Town. I am so glad that there is a place like this on planet earth. You move through the world so freely and honestly (bribes aside).

You must have fit in well with the Thai people, takes one to know one kind of nice guy kind of thing. “super nice and all huge smiles”
